title: Premium Bed Bug Pillow Protector, Waterproof / Zippered / Encasement Cover, 10 Year Warranty, Set of 2 King Size (20 x 36)
features: 100% Waterproof - Fully encases surrounds and protects the pillow on all sides against all.
Triple seal protection (tight invisible zipper, which seals fully) completely seals off your pillow.
Breathable, soft fabric creates a cooler, more comfortable sleep surface - no crinkling sound or plastic feel
Pet Industry Approved - Machine wash and tumble dry for easy care
WARRANTY: L' Cozee offers a 10 year limited warranty
description: PROTECT YOUR PILLOWS WITH L'COZEE WATERPROOF ZIPPERED PILLOW ENCASEMENT FULL TRIPLE Protection Protect your pillows and your sleep with the L'COZEE Mattress Encasement Pillow Protector. Designed with a zippered end to completely surround your pillow. A waterproof polyurethane layer blocks spills to preserve your pillow and its warranty, which may be voided by stains. Soft, Breathable Vinyl Free Fabric Soft, breathable fabric (Vinyl Free) helps maintain a cool temperature and comfortable sleep surface. A thin, noiseless waterproof membrane has micro-pores that allow air to pass while blocking liquids, bugs and allergens for protection that does not compromise airflow. Designed to provide a secure fit on pillows, this pillow protector feels and sounds like sleeping on fabric, not a sweaty, crinkly noise. Waterproof Lightweight fabric backed by a thin waterproof barrier protects your entire pillow, with triple seal protection. Safe to use for Kids and Pets This vinyl free protector is safe for use with children and pets. Machine Washable And Dryable. Includes a 10-year limited manufacturer's warranty.
